article.title: Maersk to Operate U.S. Navy Surveillance Ships
article.text: Maersk Line Ltd., Norfolk, Virginia, is being awarded a $7,103,568 modification under a previously awarded firm-fixed-price contract (N00033-13-C-2505) to exercise a 92-day option for the operation and maintenance of five U.S. Navy ocean surveillance ships and one U.S. Navy missile range instrumentation ship. The U.S. Navy's Military Sealift Command, Washington, District of Columbia, is the contracting activity.
